hi.ss: हे भाई ! संतजनों पर दूषण लगाने वालों की बात को कोई भी मनुष्य सच नहीं मानता।
hi.sts: निंदक व्यक्ति का कहा कोई नहीं मानता और

en.ms: Uttering falsehood the reviler regrets.

en.ssk: He wrings his hands, and hits his head against the ground.

en.bdb: The Lord does not forgive the slanderer. ||2||

en.ssk: Like a crane, he spreads his feathers, to look like a swan.
